::KitKat:;

She felt her spark jump and flutter as he kissed her again.  she 
opened her eyes for a moment and realized her room door was 
open. "Hang on a second." She got up, closed the door and locked it.  
She sat back down next to Drillbit. She wrapped her arms around him 
and kissed him. She smiles and keeps kissing him. "yeah, we got lots 
of time." She said in between kisses. 

The light in the room go dark.
(OK, this will be kept clean. Later on KitKat will leave her room, 
but in a much happier mood. )



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit soon forgot all about the training, he loved this too much.
> He brought his left arm, around her back, and to her left shoulder.
> He placed his other hand on her back. He gazed into her eyes, he 
truly
> loved this bot. He continued to kiss, and mumbled.
> "Nevermind, we have time." He said, kissing her again.
